Title: Ashchorjyo Prodeep
Writer: Anik Datta (dialogue), Anik Datta (screenplay), Sirshendu Mukhopadhyay (based on a short story by), Deb Roy (dialogue), Deb Roy (screenplay assistance)
Actors: Saswata Chatterjee, Rajatabha Dutta, Sreelekha Mitra, Mumtaz Sorcar
Plot: The story of a modern day Aladdin, set against the backdrop of contemporary consumer society.
